steps.title: Set up your local Python environment
steps.description:
The Pyolite kernel helps you quickly get started with Python and Jupyter notebooks.
For the best Python experience in VS Code, we recommend installing the Python extension:
[Install Python extension](command:pyolite.openPythonExtension)
And a Python environment from Anaconda:
[Install Anaconda](command:pyolite.openAnaconda)

media.altText: Install Anaconda and the Python extension for Visual Studio Code when Pyolite no longer meets your needs.
